name: Corrupt_4_Control
description:
You are a cyber virus with one end goal - to corrupt the entire digital realm! Disrupt the master system's control on the virtual world, and cause as much chaos as possible as you infect your way towards the central core and turn the system RED...  Game Controls:

W A S D to move 

Mouse to look around

Space-bar to jump, 

Escape or P to pause,

Left Mouse Click to Fire Projectile 

Game Created by: 

Keenan Simpson, Josh Bone and Redfin

Game Information:

This Game was developed from scratch in just 48 hours by the three individuals credited above as an entry into the Game Makers Tool Kit 2020 Game Jam...
